title: Real Estate Listing on Residential
input1: {Property type: Townhouse} {Location and neighborhood description: Greenfield, a serene and family-friendly community with parks, shopping, and excellent schools nearby.} {Number of bedrooms and bathrooms: 4 and 3} {Square footage of the property: 1,800 sq ft} {Key features and amenities: Open-concept living area with hardwood floors, a gourmet kitchen with quartz countertops, and a cozy fireplace in the living room. The master suite includes a private balcony and a luxurious bathroom with a rain shower.} {Unique selling points: Close proximity to hiking trails and recreational facilities.} {Any additional information or special considerations: The backyard features a patio perfect for summer barbecues and a small garden area.}
input2: {Property type: Condo} {Location and neighborhood description: Downtown Riverview, an upscale urban area known for its vibrant nightlife, dining options, and cultural attractions.} {Number of bedrooms and bathrooms: 2 and 2} {Square footage of the property: 1,200 sq ft} {Key features and amenities: Modern open layout with floor-to-ceiling windows, a sleek kitchen with high-end appliances, and a spacious living room that opens to a private balcony with city views. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom with a soaking tub.} {Unique selling points: Rooftop pool and fitness center available for residents.} {Any additional information or special considerations: Secure parking and 24-hour concierge service included.}
input1_ans: Welcome to your dream townhouse in the serene community of Greenfield! This stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom home boasts 1,800 sq ft of open-concept living space, featuring elegant hardwood floors and a cozy fireplace in the living room. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight, complete with quartz countertops and modern appliances. Retreat to the luxurious master suite, which offers a private balcony and a spa-like bathroom with a rain shower. Enjoy the outdoors in your beautifully landscaped backyard, perfect for summer barbecues and gardening. With parks, shopping, and excellent schools just moments away, plus nearby hiking trails for outdoor enthusiasts, this home is a perfect blend of comfort and convenience. Don’t miss out on this incredible opportunity!
input2_ans:
Welcome to your urban oasis in Downtown Riverview! This stunning 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo spans 1,200 sq ft and boasts a modern open layout with floor-to-ceiling windows, flooding the space with natural light. The sleek kitchen features high-end appliances, perfect for culinary enthusiasts, while the spacious living room seamlessly connects to a private balcony with breathtaking city views.

Retreat to the luxurious master suite, complete with an en-suite bathroom featuring a relaxing soaking tub. Enjoy exclusive access to a rooftop pool and fitness center, ideal for unwinding after a busy day. With secure parking and 24-hour concierge service, convenience and security are at your fingertips. Experience the vibrant nightlife, dining, and cultural attractions just steps away. Don’t miss this opportunity to elevate your lifestyle!
